page.title: 03 Coleford Police House
page.content: On{Monday 13th}of{May}some children from Class One visited the {Police {Station.} We asked him some questions aboat his work. He showed us some of his{fire proof}clothes. We asked him what he liked best in his job and he said he enjoyed helping people. Altogether there was seven in our group. First of all we drew the police house. Two of the boys in our group put the{hand-cuffs}on. We asked him if he had ever broken his{truncheon}and he said , "No but I have damaged it." We all had a go at holding the truncheon. We all said that it was very heavy. One of the girls drew our policeman. He said,"Can I have a look please?" She was laughing because it was funny. He started being a policeman when he was nineteen. He joined the cadets when he was seventeen.
